title: China's Didi Crackdown, Controlling Data
itunes:title: China's Didi Crackdown, Controlling Data
description:
Leland Miller, CEO of China Beige Book International, discusses China's crackdown on Didi. Jordan Jackson, VP, Global Market Strategist at J.P. Morgan Investment Management, talks markets. Dan Devorsetz, CIO and Executive VP at Horizon Technology Finance, talks about opportunity and demand for venture debt. James Rasteh, CIO and Founding Partner of Coast Capital, discusses bitcoin, gold, and ESG investing. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
